text: Fathali Oveisi (; 11 January 1946 – 5 October 2021) was an Iranian actor and movie director. He was born in Tehran, Iran. He acted in Captain Khorshid (1987), Baanoo (1999), Hamoun (1990), Love-stricken (1992) and Cactus. Oveisi was hospitalized with a stroke in Tehran and went into a coma on 30 September 2021. He died on 5 October 2021, aged 75.فتحعلی اویسی درگذشت ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Iranian movie directors Category:Actors from Tehran
title: Fathali Oveisi
